00032 #include "nsISupports.idl"
00033 #include "sbIRemoteMediaList.idl"
00034 
00035 interface nsISimpleEnumerator;
00036 interface nsIStringEnumerator;
00037 interface sbIMediaItem;
00038 
00039 /*
00040 Class: Library
00041 
00042 A <Library> is a collection of <MediaItems> and <MediaLists>.
00043 It is possible to create a <Library> using the <Songbird::siteLibrary>
00044 function.
00045 
00046 Example:
00047   (start code)
00048   //Create or get a library.
00049   var library = songbird.siteLibrary("", "");
00050 
00051   //Create a medialist using the library.
00052   var mediaList = songbird.createMediaList("simple");
00053 
00054   //Create some mediaitems and add them to the medialist.
00055   var itemURLs = ["http://path/to/song.mp3", "http://path/to/another/song.mp3"];
00056   for(var url in itemURLs) {
00057 
00058     //Calling createMediaItem may throw an exception when it fails
00059     //to create the mediaitem.
00060 
00061     try {
00062       var mediaItem = library.createMediaItem(url);
00063       mediaList.add(mediaItem);
00064     }
00065     catch(e) {
00066 
00067       //Dump it.
00068       dump("Failed creation of mediaitem: " + e);
00069 
00070       //Or alert it.
00071       alert("Failed creation of mediaitem: " + e);
00072 
00073       //Oops the URL was not valid.
00074       if(e.result == Components.results.NS_ERROR_INVALID_ARG) {
00075         alert("The URL: " + url + " was not valid.");
00076       }
00077 
00078     }
00079   }
00080   (end code)
00081 
00082 See Also:
00083   <Songbird>
00084   <MediaItem>
00085   <MediaList>
00086 */
00087 
00099 [scriptable, uuid(a8193c8e-4f9a-4b31-ae7b-4f4ee07f4efb)]
00100 interface sbIRemoteLibrary : nsISupports
00101 {
00112   /*
00113   Prop: scanMediaOnCreation
00114 
00115   Set this property to true if you wish all new <MediaItems>
00116   created to be scanned for metadata.
00117 
00118   Set this property to false if you wish to skip scanning
00119   for metadata when <MediaItems> are created.
00120 
00121   If you are attempting to set all of your own metadata for <MediaItems>
00122   you create, you may set this to false to prevent your metadata
00123   from being overwritten.
00124 
00125   Note:
00126     This property defaults to _true_.
00127 
00128   Type:
00129     Boolean
00130   */
00131   attribute boolean scanMediaOnCreation;
00132 
00144   /*
00145   Func: createMediaItem()
00146 
00147   Create a <MediaItem> from a URL. You may pass in
00148   http and https URLs. Local file URLs are not permitted.
00149 
00150   Prototype:
00151     <MediaItem> createMediaItem(String url)
00152 
00153   Parameters:
00154     url - A URL referring to a media file.
00155 
00156   Returns:
00157     The newly created <MediaItem>.
00158 
00159   Throws:
00160     Invalid Argument (Components.results.NS_ERROR_INVALID_ARG)
00161     if the URL isn't http or https.
00162 
00163   Example:
00164     (start code)
00165     //Create or get a library.
00166     var library = songbird.siteLibrary("", "");
00167 
00168     //Create the mediaitem from a url pointing to a media file.
00169     var mediaItem = null;
00170 
00171     //This function may throw if it fails to create the item because
00172     //the URL is invalid.
00173     try {
00174       mediaItem = library.createMediaItem("http://path/to/file.mp3");
00175     }
00176     catch(e) {
00177       //Oops, bad URL.
00178       if(e.result == Components.results.NS_ERROR_INVALID_ARG) {
00179         alert("Oops, the URL was not valid.");
00180       }
00181     }
00182     (end)
00183 
00184   See Also:
00185     <createMediaList()>
00186     <createMediaListFromURL()>
00187   */
00188   sbIMediaItem createMediaItem(in AString aURL);
00189 
00201   /*
00202   Func: createMediaList()
00203 
00204   Create an empty <MediaList> of a certain type.
00205 
00206   Prototype:
00207     <MediaList> createMediaList(String type)
00208 
00209   Parameters:
00210     type - The type of <MediaList> to create.
00211 
00212   Returns:
00213     The newly created <MediaList> or null.
00214 
00215   Note:
00216     Currently only the type "simple" is supported.
00217 
00218   Example:
00219     (start code)
00220     //Create or get a library.
00221     var library = songbird.siteLibrary("", "");
00222 
00223     //Create an empty medialist.
00224     var mediaList = library.createMediaList("simple");
00225     (end)
00226 
00227   See Also:
00228     <createMediaItem()>
00229     <createMediaListFromURL()>
00230   */
00231   sbIRemoteMediaList createMediaList(in AString aType);
00232 
00248   /*
00249   Func: createMediaListFromURL()
00250 
00251   Create a <MediaList> from a URL. The URL may point to an
00252   m3u, pls, rss or html file. After being created, the <MediaList>
00253   will contain all valid <MediaItems> it could create from the URLs
00254   it found in the file.
00255 
00256   Prototype:
00257     <MediaList> createMediaListFromFile(String url)
00258 
00259   Parameters:
00260     url - The URL of the file to use for creating the <MediaList>.
00261 
00262   Returns:
00263     The newly created <MediaList> or null.
00264 
00265   Example:
00266     (start code)
00267     //Create or get a library.
00268     var library = songbird.siteLibrary("", "");
00269 
00270     //Create the medialist from a url pointing to a file.
00271     var mediaList = library.createMediaListFromURL("http://path/to/file.m3u");
00272     (end)
00273 
00274   See Also:
00275     <createMediaItem()>
00276     <createMediaList()>
00277   */
00278   sbIRemoteMediaList createMediaListFromURL(in AString aURL);
00279 
00288   [noscript] void connectToDefaultLibrary(in AString aLibName);
00289 
00296   /*
00297   Func: getMediaListByName()
00298 
00299   Get the site media list with the given name.  Note that to compare for
00300   identity one must compare the guid (instead of JS object comparisions).
00301 
00302   Prototype:
00303     <MediaList> getMediaListByName(String name)
00304 
00305   Paramters:
00306     name - The name of the media list to fetch
00307 
00308   Returns:
00309     The corresponding media list, or null if not found
00310 
00311   Example:
00312     (start code)
00313     //Create or get a library.
00314     var library = songbird.siteLibrary("", "");
00315 
00316     //Fetch the shopping cart media list
00317     var mediaList = library.getMediaListByName("Shopping Cart");
00318 
00319     // comparisons for equality must be done on the guid
00320     var cart = library.getMediaListByName("Shopping Cart");
00321     alert(mediaList.guid == cart.guid);
00322     (end)
00323 
00324   See Also:
00325     <createMediaList()>
00326   */
00327   sbIRemoteMediaList getMediaListByName( in AString aName );
00328 
00329   nsIStringEnumerator getArtists();
00330   nsIStringEnumerator getAlbums();
00331   nsIStringEnumerator getGenres();
00332   nsIStringEnumerator getYears();
00333 
00334   nsISimpleEnumerator getPlaylists();
00335 };
